title: Build adapter/codex/ with OTEL trace parser
description: Build CodexAdapter in adapter/codex/. Implements AgentAdapter interface. OtelServer collector with Codex-specific trace event parsing. Maps codex.conversation_starts -> EventSessionStarted (discovers thread ID), codex.user_prompt -> EventTurnStarted, codex.sse_event(completed) -> EventTurnCompleted (token counts), codex.tool_result -> EventToolCompleted, codex.tool_decision(ask_user) -> EventApprovalRequested. HandleHookEvent returns false (Codex doesn't use h2 hooks).
